name: Flesh Eating Geriatric Internet Predator
description:
An all new Interactive FMV game

You are a projectionist tasked with assembling a long lost Horror Film for it’s first screening ever.
A girl obsessed with vampires ends up meeting the real horrifying thing but he's far from the sparkly man of her dreams.

Featuring

• Stylized FMV video
• Multiple paths
• Multiple endings
• Hidden scenes
• Secret Music Videos
